ValidationRule.description: When kit is shipped to surrogate, all shipping fields are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), Ship_Kit_to_Surrogate__c = true, OR ( ISBLANK(Surrogate_FirstName__c), ISBLANK(Surrogate_LastName__c), ISBLANK(Surrogate_City__c), ISBLANK(Surrogate_Postal_Code__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Surrogate_State_Province__c)), ISBLANK(Surrogate_Street_Address__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When shipping kit to Surrogate, you must include Surrogate's first name, last name, shipping street, city, state and zip.
